title: Porcupine Tree - Stupid Dream [1999] 2013 Vinyl Rip (FLAC 24-96)
description:
Porcupine Tree - Stupid Dream [1999] 2013 Vinyl Rip (FLAC 24/96)

Kscope - KSCOPE845 

Discogs link:

Hardware:

Audio-Technica AT-LP120-USB direct drive turntable (AT95E cartridge/stylus)
Creative Sound Blaster X-Fi HD (combo pre-amp/DAC)
AMD FX-8350 4.0 GHz 8-core, 16GB DDR3

Software:

Adobe Audition CC 2015 (recording)
Audacity 2.1.0 (editing)
Trader's Little Helper 2.7.0 (FLAC encoding) 
Tag&Rename 3.9.1 (tagging)

Recorded at true 24bit/96khz in Adobe Audition CC 2015 and then performed tracking, Normalization and Click Removal in Audacity.  Encoded to FLAC @ level 6 using Trader's Little Helper.  All tracks properly tagged with artwork using Tag&Rename.  

Track list:

Side 1

A1 	Even Less 	7:11
A2 	Piano Lessons 	4:20
A3 	Stupid Dream 	0:31
A4	Pure Narcotic   5:07

Side 2

B1 	Slave Called Shiver	4:41
B2 	Don't Hate Me		8:36

Side 3

C1 	This is No Rehearsal 		3:26
C2 	Baby Dream in Cellophane 	3:14
C3 	Stranger by the Minute 		4:30
C4 	A Smart Kid			5:23

Side 4

D1 	Tinto Brass 	6:37
D2 	Stop Swimming 	6:52


Notes:

Kscope reissue of the 2005 master on 180g vinyl.
Gatefold sleeve, printed inner sleeves, lyrics on inner spread.

Sticker reads:
Heavyweight vinyl, 2 LP gatefold edition of the 1999 classic remixed & remastered by Steven Wilson

Recorded at Foel Studio, Llanfair Caerinon, Wales and at No Man's Land, Hemel Hempstead, England (Jan-Nov 1998)
Orchestra recorded at the Cedar Arts Centre, Derby, England
New stereo mixes at No Man's Land September 2005

Published by Imagem Music Publishing Ltd.
Sleeve design for Aleph Studio (2)

Â© 2005 Lava Records
Made in Germany
